phrases: I finally climbed up the ladder enough to get a TV appearance.
These greenrooms sure do make you restless, though.
A boy was possessed by a fox after playing Kokkuri-san after school!?
What the heck is he doing?
Will we be able to save the poor,
unfortunate young man that is been possessed?
Let us introduce our two powerful helpers!
The first one needs no introduction.
The president of the Rising Sun Spiritual Union, Jodo Kirin-sensei!
He is solved devastating problems for many.
He is the best of the best!
The other is making his first appearance on TV.
You can find my business in Seasoning City.
What are some of your accomplishments up till now, Reigen-sensei?
It is hard to choose just one...
Oh, but I did defeat the Dragger.
Looks like we can expect great things.
And now, let us bring out the boy.
To be extra careful, since he may freak out,
mentioned that he was possessed by a fox after playing the Kokkuri-san game.
it is a ghost of a Ruppell's fox, which are usually found in North Africa.
He was able to precisely deduce the kind of ghost it is!
The poor child... being strapped down like that.
I am hoping we do not have to keep those things on him much longer.
So we all feel the same.
And now, we are finally going to witness the public exorcism!
But before that, a word from our sponsors.
When we are back on air, we are going to have Jodo-sensei do the exorcism.
Actually, why do not we have Reigen-kun give it a shot?
No one wants to see an old man.
Let us show the country how a next-generation psychic does things.
Was not I just supposed to sit there and comment today?
I am trying to give you the spotlight here.
But if you are not up to the task, very well.
I will do it, just as it says in the script.
I will do it after all.
Reigen-sensei's going to perform the exorcism this time.
We are coming back from commercial!
And it looks like we are just about ready for this public exorcism.
is an exciting newcomer who has had a meteoric rise!
I, Reigen Arataka, shall accept this job!
I shall successfully get rid of this spirit!
Live or not, this is still a TV show.
It is all a setup written by some scriptwriter.
If I do some random exorcism,
that will quietly be the cue for the boy to calm down
and the studio audience to clap.
Then the host will praise me, and the show will be over.
And he just started throwing a ton of salt outta nowhere!
The spirit possessing the boy seems to be struggling in agony.
But it has never worked before!
Now that I know that, I am not pulling any punches!
Well, it is been about 30 minutes since the exorcism started,
but apparently, the spirit just refuses to leave.
I have already used up all my special moves
and now I am trying to keep things going with ad-libs!
All right, let us have our other psychic step in.
Was I just an opening act?
Is he going to take all the glory?!
Reigen-kun, good work the last 30 minutes.
What am I supposed to exorcise here?
This boy is not even possessed.
Why did you ruin all that setup the program built up for you?!
I am impressed you were able to see the truth
when everyone in the studio has been tricked this whole time!
A true psychic has just been revealed!
My name is Fukuda Suzuo, and I am a child actor from the Mongolian Spot Agency!
I could barely tell he was acting!
Sci-fi researcher, Mogi-san, what did you think?
I would like to ask that gentleman over there
what all that exorcism crap was about.
What were you doing to a spirit that did not even exist?
Reigen-sensei, I am sure our viewers are wondering that as well.
Could it be... that you actually do not have spiritual powers?
Let us just say this is how he works.
It should have been completely obvious if the boy was possessed or not...
If you are a true psychic, that is.
It is not like I am referring to Reigen-san.
I am sure he was trying to liven things up for the sake of the program.
But I can guarantee that we did not ask him to do that.
Then what in the world were you doing for 30 minutes?
It appeared as though that boy was possessed by some spirit...
Even if he was merely acting like he was possessed,
spirits could come by at any moment.
I never knew evil spirits were so punctual!
What kind of spirit was it?
What kind of spirit was it?
Did you watch yesterday's ep of Supernatural Detective?
A psychic who is an expert on fraud
That was basically a public execution.
Anonymous Table Salt hhhhhhhhhhhhhhIf that were me, I would end myself
Looks like Reigen's dug himself into a hole...
There is no way that guy's a fraud.
I wonder if Reigen-san has a plan to get out of this.
They are apparently making a group for his victims.
But we are not victims, though.
So he was a con artist after all.
It is probably his fault we are not getting any job offers.
I knew there was something off about him.
I am going to feed the media even more bullcrap about him!
Hey, I might just be remembering wrong,
but is not the place you work called Spirits and Such Consultation Office?
Your master's getting bashed like crazy on TV and the Internet!
We are getting a lot more actual jobs now.
Spirits and Such Consul tation Office
The star psychic of the 21st century who defeated Ohiki-san
If I become famous, I might be able to break through to other media platforms.
That is all part of his plan.
Did he really think people would not find out?
And he calls himself a spirit medium?
I have actually been a victim of spiritual fraud myself.
They wanted to undress for an exorcism.
They used me as a scapegoat to boost their ratings for like 30 seconds?!
For now, I need to contain this and ensure I do not become an even bigger meme.
Anonymous Table Salt hhhhDat name though
Anonymous Table Salt hhhh Reigen's the real deal.
hhhhHe's actually performed an exorcism on me, and my hhhhshoulders and back feel so much lighter now.
Anonymous Table Salt hhhh I bet that is Reigen, is not it?
I am trying to be objective here...
Get lost, you fraud Anonymous Table Salt
Do you even realize you are a criminal?
I found Reigen's high school graduation photo
Is that how it is going to be, you little bastards?
Like I would let a bunch of little shits who do not know a thing about hard work beat me!
But the title and reputation of scam artist psychic
spread like wildfire across media platforms like a game of telephone.
And in three days, being the ultimate evil had basically become Reigen's public image.
This is not true at all!
How dare they spread these lies about me?
Self-Proclaimed New Star of the Psychic World Reigen: The Scam Artist Psychic His Unbelievably Bold Tricks!!!
I need you guys all to be my witnesses to stop these guys from calling me a fraud.
All you have to do is talk to the media.
Hey, why are not you being as annoying as usual?
You probably thought we were prime prey!
We are not falling for that!
And here I thought he was a little cute, too!
Well, I guess the only thing I can do now is wait until this all blows over.
Are they actually staking out my place?
What was that so-called exorcism you performed on that show?
Do not you think you need to explain yourself?
You could at least give us some answers!
The people are not going to be satisfied with this!
Everyone has their eye on you!
How about holding a press conference?
Reigen Arataka, the man who is garnered attention
for allegedly conning people with psychic scams,
announced that he will be holding a press conference tomorrow.
We believe the subjects that will be discussed will include
Plans to Hold a Press Conference
if his previous activities were indeed illegal,
and if he actually even possesses spiritual powers.
I will show you a top secret way to...
You seem to be in a lot of trouble.
I prepared an apology for you to say at the press conference, so if you get in trouble, just read that.
Learn your lesson from this, quit this scamming business, and get a real job.
I know your dad does not say it much, but he is worried about you.
You have not been home lately at all.
This is the perfect opportunity for us to all have a family meeting.
Thank you all for gathering here today.
I am sorry that you all had to take the time to show up today over my own personal actions.
First of all, I would like to apologize to all the people I have troubled, as well as to all of their friends and family members I may have burdened.
I would like to take this opportunity to formally apologize to everyone.
I am so terribly sorry for everything I have done.
I thought I would have a chance if we were just going to argue,
but now my head's completely blank.
First, you need to get the reporters to have a good impression of you.
F-First, I would like to thank you all for gathering...
Why did you all gather here today, anyway?
It is pretty common to suddenly get tired of all this shit at the last minute.
You are the one who said you would hold a press conference!
That is because you guys kept stalking me to my house.
You basically made me hold this thing.
I have a few questions regarding the fraudulent acts you have committed.
By fraudulent acts, are you referring to my business?
Is there anyone here that can actually prove I do not have any spiritual powers?
Or maybe any victims who can prove they have been scammed?
There are a lot of people who have reported that they have been scammed
Why are you saying it like that?!
Because it has not been proven.
Unless and until they are, I can still call myself a psychic.
I would be careful with how you phrase things if I were you.
All right, I have a question.
Do you actually have spiritual powers?
Because you will not be satisfied unless I say no.
I cannot prove that I have spiritual powers since you all lack them yourselves.
Are you really going to try to talk your way out of this?
Judging from the broadcast the other day,
you do seem like you are excellent at ad-libbing.
Did you just click your tongue?
No, I was just testing the mics.
Uh-oh, now he is copping an attitude.
Popular All tweets Users Pictures Videos News
When did you start this psychic business of yours?
Level of sorry: 0 What is the criminal getting all pissy for?
What were you doing prior to that?
Did that company have anything to do with psychics?
He is actually answering the questions.
What kind of problems did people come to you with?
Stiff shoulders, spirit photos, and stuff.
Any particular case that stands out?
Getting rid of some urban legends.
Have you ever had any conflicts with your clients?
Have you ever sold any expensive salt or prayer beads?
Apparently, information about when you were a student is spreading over the Internet.
According to your graduation essay, you wrote this...
What made you get into the psychic business?
D-Do not keep making the media outlets your enemy.
He is at a loss for words.
He does not have his usual zing.
Why did I decide to live as a psychic?
It is not like it is lucrative, and it is usually troublesome.
The ultimate natural spring water to keep you healthy
there was a time when I always did everything efficiently
and was filled with curiosity about everything.
But then I got bored, quit my job, and rented that office on a whim.
I ended up getting into this facade of a job because of an ad I saw in a magazine.
You can become a millionaire, too!!
I actually meant to quit a long time ago.
My body felt so heavy, but now I am fine!
As it stands, I am no different from a masseur.
Guess it is about time to wrap things up.
I wonder what I should do next.
Being a PI sounds pretty fun,
but maybe not, since apparently they mostly do investigations on cheating spouses.
I came here because I saw your sign.
Er... Oh, it is just a kid.
There are times when I cannot control my powers very well,
Did someone tell you to come here and tell me that?
I have not been able to talk to anyone about this.
I thought you might be the same as me...
If I tried, I could see spirits, too.
No, maybe it is an overactive imagination.
Either way, he seems rather troubled by this.
I was troubled a lot when I was a kid, too.
He is staring at me with eyes brimming with hope.
This kid's in his own fantasy world.
I will just come up with something to get him to go home.
Just because you have psychic powers
does not make you any less human.
It is the same as people who are fast, people who are book smart,
and people with strong body odor.
Psychic powers are just another characteristic.
You must embrace that as a part of yourself and continue to live positively.
The truth behind one's charm is kindness.
May I come to talk to you again?
Yeah, I do not know about that.
I am pretty busy, you know?
Anyway, you should go home for tod Hot!
You said you could see ghosts, too, right?
Do you know how to exorcise them, too?
Come again tomorrow around the same time.
I will show you how to use your powers.
Back then, I could not help but admire this kid that walked into my life.
I wanted to grasp something for myself, too.
I wanted to become someone special.
I have not changed at all since then.
In the end, I could not become anything.
Maybe I was the one who was holding him back from his youth the most.
Man, I said something really awful back then.
He wanted to change, and yet I tried to cage him in.
You have grown up so much.
What kind of answer is that?!
We are experiencing an extremely powerful earthquake!
CG technology is getting incredible lately Press
Where is this press conference being held?
That does not seem like Reigen-san.
How can you remain so calm?!
Are you the one doing this?!
Is this due to your spiritual powers?
Gee, I wonder what is going on.
Are you done asking me if I am a fraud or not?
In that case, I will be ending this press conference.
What is going to happen to us?!
You should probably concentrate on finding your next big story.
Let us get the hell out of here.
They are going to be running around for a while.
Have not you seen any of the stuff on the web or magazines?
I have always known... from the beginning.
Let us have some ramen and head home.
Oh, by the way, Master, happy birthday.
Mob's finally telling Tsubomi-chan how he really feels about her?
And he is going to try to place within the top 10 in a marathon?
Welp, looks like he is going to need my help.
That is the absolute best decision.
